# weightedDurationSum

**Instance Property**

The sum of exposure durations weighted by their attenuation.

## Declaration

```swift
var weightedDurationSum: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion



This value is stored as seconds, rounded up to the next minute. Divide by 60 to convert to minutes when displaying to the user.

[doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENExposureSummaryItem/weightedDurationSum] ignores [doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENExposureWindow/infectiousness] and [doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENExposureWindow/diagnosisReportType]; therefore, it can be nonzero for encounters that have a infectiousness weight or diagnosis report type weight of `0`.

## Getting Summary Properties

- **maximumScore**: The highest score of all exposures for this item.
- **scoreSum**: The sum of scores for all exposure for this item.
